title: We are unable to log you in because you may be off line
body: I just queued for a ranked game, banned, picked my champ and started going into the game when it said there was a problem to reconnect. I try to reconnect and my client crashes. No problem I will just log back in but then I get the message above and I am clearly on line with a good connection. So now I lost one of my placement games. Is there any way for this game not to count or am I just SOL?

replies.body:
It's really shitty that this cost a placement game, sorry dude.  :/  The issue is being looked into now, and seems to be caused while trying to re-log into the client while still in a game.  We have a pinned thread up now with a workaround in the meantime:


Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

If you got a leaverbuster as a result, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  No guarantees, but we want to look at each case individually.  Hang in there my friends!
